org.assertj.core.util

Class Strings.StringsToJoin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.util.Strings.StringsToJoin
  • Enclosing class:
    Strings

    public static class Strings.StringsToJoin
extends Object
    Knows how to join Strings using a given delimiter.
    See Also:
    Strings.join(String[])
